game.name: Kiki's Nightmare
game.shortDescription: An adventure RPG where you step in the shoes of a fearless hero. Navigate through unhospitable terrain, fierce enemies and save Kiki from her own terrifying dream!
game.shortDescriptionEn: An adventure RPG where you step in the shoes of a fearless hero. Navigate through unhospitable terrain, fierce enemies and save Kiki from her own terrifying dream!
